data.system_settings: Microsoft Windows Version 1803 (OS Build 17134.376) [For build of Discord, this also works on Chrome 70.0.3538.77]
data.client_settings: Microsoft Edge 42.17134.1.0 Microsoft EdgeHTML 17.17134 / [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 27065
data.actual_result: The quiz breaks for half of a second
data.expected_result: The quiz is not supposed to break for half a second
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > HypeSquad - If you are in HypeSquad, press "Take the test again", but if you are not in HypeSquad, press "Join HypeSquad" - You will be in the quiz modal and should be able to take a quiz - Answer and press "Next question" as fast as you can - Do this multiple times - The quiz will sometimes get out of place
